website_summaries.verdict: A 100% vegetarian turmeric that is gluten and dairy free.
pros: Contains a black pepper extract to aid in absorption
Many felt that it worked well for joint pain and stiffness
cons: Some complaints of smaller dosage of turmeric compared to other brands

customer_reviews.title: Improved tendinitis and knee pain - love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Before taking this supplement I have had severe Achilles tendinitis for years and also slight soreness in my knee - especially when going down stairs. For the first time I’ve seen a dramatic reduction in my Achilles pain and my knee pain is gone. I will say I am combining this supplement with exercise, lots of water and clean eating. However I was doing those other steps six months prior with no change in condition. I think the combination of both really works to lower inflammation.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Tedrow

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: After taking for 8 weeks I have NOT noticed a difference in pain or aches - would not recommend. I love garden of life products, however, I feel that these have made zero difference with pain
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have loved and trusted this brand for decades! And this product is no different than any of the others I use. I highly recommend this - it's organic and it's got the right combo of ingredients. For anyone who isn't aware - you MUST have black pepper combined with your turmeric for your body to absorb and use the turmeric. You cant just use the turmeric alone or it wont work
customer_reviews.author: Lily Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning
customer_reviews.text: There are some kind of capsules mixed into my bottle of tablets. Very unsettling.
customer_reviews.author: KIM

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I think the dose was too high for me. I started getting random nosebleeds (mostly in the evening). They stopped when I discontinued this turmeric. If the same dose was split into two smaller tablets, I would have continued using at half dose. I love Garden of Life and use several other products, but unfortunately I will go back to my old brand for turmeric.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Z

customer_reviews.title: This product helps with pain.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to help my RA and it has significantly helped with my pain. Tumeric has helped both my husband and me to feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turmeric, need to try it.
customer_reviews.text: Getting so many information about the many benefits, today I received my first turmeric supply for 4 months. Since It’s poorly absorbed I love the addition of pepper so it can get absorbed better.
customer_reviews.author: Aida

customer_reviews.title: Pill too large!
customer_reviews.text: This pill is too large and hard. I choked on it the first time and that was scary for me. I have used Garden of Life prroducts before and I liked them very much. This product should have been made smaller and then taking 2 would have worked better. I'm giving it one star because they are too big to swallow for me, so I can't risk taking them and it was a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Haddad

customer_reviews.title: GOD SENT 👍😀 STOPPED TAKING PAIN MEDS
customer_reviews.text: Use these for 1 month, STOPPED TAKING all pain meds, been off everything for 4 months 😀👍
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Had trouble swallowing them
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty fat, so I had trouble getting it down. Tried cutting it in half, but that just left a sharp edge that wasn't pleasant going down either. I bought another brand in capsules, so that solved my problem. I don't think I took them long enough to see if there was any pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gowers

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar...
customer_reviews.text: Why on earth did you put 2 types of sugars in here....Dextrose raises blood sugar...who needs that
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!!
customer_reviews.text: Helps with joints! I’ve been taking these pills for about 6 weeks now and it has reduced the pain about 80% usually I would have knee pain about 5 days out of the week and now I only get slight pain about once a week and not for very long maybe just an hr or so. I will update this review if anything changed but I will definitely keep taking these!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Staple in My regiman
customer_reviews.text: I practice yoga 6 days a week and these keep inflammation at bay. They are a staple.
customer_reviews.author: shanna

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These turmeric tablets are what I was looking for. It is an USDA organic and Non GMO product. The curcuminoids dose is right for me, and very important, it has black pepper extract to help with the absorption of the curcuminoids. Plus, it has probiotics! I think it is an excellent choice. I must say I did not buy it for the inflamatory response, but for many other health benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: This turmeric works
customer_reviews.text: These pills are a bit large but ok to swallow. I really notice a difference in less inflammation when I take them.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Great result
customer_reviews.text: This products worked for me. Doctor diagnosed me with RA and I suppose to be on prescription medication with horrible side effects. I decide to try everything to avoid taking them. I used to wake up with pain and heavy feelings on my ankles and wrists. After a week of take this pill with Advil I feel very good. FYI: take it with food
customer_reviews.author: Ilmira

customer_reviews.title: Trusted Brand & Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and trusted brand. I buy several other things from Garden of Life. I have found out that more people than not should be taking this daily due to its natural way of lowing inflammation instead of using pharmaceutical pills that can damage organs. The pill form is fine for adults, yet the gummies are delicious and convenient for kiddoes. My little one gets one gummy everyday with her vitamins and elderberry.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Great for inflammation
customer_reviews.text: I have Rheumatoid Arthritis and this definitely has helped with the inflammation of my joints and relief of pain that I normally suffer from daily. I Love this brand I also take the women’s daily vitamins and probiotics supplements that I take daily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this product I think it has assisted with inflammation and overall health in regard to organs and joints.
customer_reviews.author: Subtle_J

customer_reviews.title: Like this turmeric supplement
customer_reviews.text: Love this supplement. I mainly use Nutrilite, but they don't have a turmeric supplement like this one. I like Garden of Life's reputation for supplements I can't get from Nutrilite, and I am happy with my purchase. Yes, the pills are big, but there is the solution of buying a pill cutter and cutting it in half.
customer_reviews.author: angelvashir

customer_reviews.title: Works great. The pills are large though.
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble with my joints, especially my wrists. They will go numb from writing and driving, and I often have pain. This product helps relieve those issues. My only complaint is that the pills are very large. If you have trouble swallowing pills, then these might not be good for you.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: perfect does of tumeric
customer_reviews.text: I get bad heartburn if I take a higher dose of turmeric, so I had to search for one that had a lower dose as well as black pepper. I am happy with this brand, the only complaint it they are a bit big and takes more effort to swallow them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Campa

customer_reviews.title: Quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: For inflammation for RA. It does work and can tell when l don't take it.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful supplement, great price
customer_reviews.text: This supplement helps my chronic pelvic pain tremendously. It’s easy on my stomach.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve noticed a decrease in bloating and puffiness since using this product.

customer_reviews.title: amazing brand and product!
customer_reviews.text: if you are deciding between brands, this is the best on the market!!!!

customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was purchasing but for a lower price and delivered to my door.

customer_reviews.title: Turns your skin yellow
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw it away. It was turning my skin yellow. I was warned it could do that, but I found out after I bought it. I guess I should have done more research. It seems all turmeric does this.

customer_reviews.title: Product is different
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble swallowing these big tablets but the product does work for my pain.

customer_reviews.text: Great product and great price. The combination offers pain relief and helps with inflammation. I have purchased this several times.

customer_reviews.text: Have been using these for a while and happy with the results.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: These made me very nauseous. I gave them to a friend who can tolerate them.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I liked it alot, garden of life always delivers quality products!

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: I strongly recommend taking turmeric w/curcumin. It is a supplement that prevents so many things. I really like this organic Tumeric.

customer_reviews.title: Great for aches and pain!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this a month ago, and still taking it as my daily supplement. I have noticed my knee pain and back pain have slightly subsided. But you also have to contribute with self care and stretching and working out. Overall, I would definitely purchase again once my stock is done.

customer_reviews.title: These are really, really great

I’d suggest getting some of you also struggle with inflammatory discomfort.

customer_reviews.title: Just the product I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is the same product I had been using so no surprises. Thank you! I will purchase again when I’m getting low.

customer_reviews.title: great

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for about 3 months (one bottle) and I am about to purchase another. Not a strong flavor and easy to swallow. I take them every day around a meal and have had no side effects.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bottle did not contain amount is should have
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, but opened today, just ran out of my previous bottle, there were only 32 pills in a bottle which was supposed to have 120.

customer_reviews.title: I don't notice any pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of using turmeric thinking it's a healthy thing to do

customer_reviews.title: Won’t be buying again
customer_reviews.text: Major bummer I can’t buy these anymore after Nestle bought them out.

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients: PALM OIL!
customer_reviews.text: They have PALM OIL!!! What the heck Garden of Life? WHY on God’s green earth would you add PALM OIL to vegan supplements? First, Palm oil is very inflammatory. Second, Palm Oil is one of the biggest destroyers of the rain forest!!! I would return these, but I already opened them. So disappointed in the company Garden of Life. Never purchasing from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great Tumeric Product
customer_reviews.text: Love Garden of Life. This is another great product from an outstanding "non-heat processing company. Only wish these came in capsule form like their vitamins. . These pills are too huge to swallow easily. Hard to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The one that works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried over 5 different brands of turmeric supplements. Some has probiotics inside some dont. This one for some miraculous reason it just works for me. I can take double or triple other brands but the pain persists. But as soon as I get back on this, the next day the pain goes away. Highly recommended!!! I’ve recommended over 10 people to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yesuaini99

customer_reviews.title: Best-value size and formulation
customer_reviews.text: This product is so hard to find because you really save a lot of money by buying 120 tablets at one time! Also, unlike other Tumeric supplements, this one only requires one tablet per serving — which makes this even a better value — and is made with fermented turmeric and probiotics to enhance nutrient absorption and potency. After buying this product multiple times, the quality has been consistent and well-worth-it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura H

customer_reviews.title: RA
customer_reviews.text: I purchased turmeric for relief of inflammation due to RA. I’ve used this brand for about a year and it’s made a significant difference with additional holistic healing.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Best Turmeric Around!
customer_reviews.text: I have Fibromyalgia and have tried several Turmeric supplements. I take two a day and it has helped with my pain better than any other. I have had no stomach issues and the price for the amount you receive is great. I like the glass container as it seems to bring a purity to the supplement. Although everyone is different in the way they metabolize supplements, but I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tall

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product is hard to swallow, smells bad and doesn't work. I choked this pill down for at least 2 months and after that I gave up. It didn't work and it was not worth the trouble of trying to swallow it.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Because of the large pills I had a small problem in swallowing, so I tried several other brands. Nothing works like Mykind Organics! This brand is also sold at several health food stores, but since I can't get out, thankfully you can get it here. I won't use anything else in the future. This REALLY helps my arthritis pain in the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other turmeric brands
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several brands of turmeric , but this is the first brand that provides consistent quality and consistent relief for the inflammation in my hands and other joints. It comes in a tablet form, and it seems to be fresher and more potent than many of the capsules I've received before, which apparently makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Works for my bursitis inflammation
customer_reviews.text: This product has totally reduced the inflammation in my hip from bursitis. I wanted to try something organic & non-gmo instead of a shot or medication. This works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S

customer_reviews.title: No Change for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm mid-50s and Dr. suggested I try tumeric for general post-workout aches, pains & inflammation. I'm athletic & active looking for an alternative to NSAIDs. I've taken it for almost 10 weeks and haven't noticed any change. I'll try tart cherry & pineapple juice next...
customer_reviews.author: MorninGlory

customer_reviews.title: Better than tylenol
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple sclerosis and am a frequent runner. To say I have some chronic pain is an understatement. The morning after I took my first dose of this, I woke up without any plantar fasciitis pain for the first time in over a year. I was nearly in tears.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: I swear by this

customer_reviews.title: great supplement

product_meta.title: Garden of Life mykind Organics Extra Strength Turmeric Inflammatory Response 60 Tablets-100mg Curcumin (95% Curcuminoids) Black Pepper, Probiotics, Organic Non-GMO Vegan Gluten Free Herbal Supplement
product_meta.description: Size:60 Count (Pack of 1)Turmeric root (especially curcumin) has been long known for its antioxidant and healthy inflammation response properties.† Our Extra Strength turmeric contains 100mg of curcumin. For an additional boost, we’ve added organic whole turmeric and ginger root fermented to support their bioavailability.
feature_bullets: Supports the body’s healthy inflammatory function and antioxidant response
100mg curcumin from organic whole turmeric root—plus ginger root—both fermented to support bioavailability
Probiotics & organic black pepper extract for enhanced digestion
Nutrients from real foods using water extraction & clean tablet technology with 100% organic & non-GMO tablet materials—no soy or corn-derived ingredients or chemicals
Certified USDA Organic, Non-GMO Project Verified, NSF Certified Gluten Free, Certified Vegan & Kosher
